parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> The statement is executed when the trigger or waypoint is activated and the effects are launched depending on the result.

*If the result is a [[Boolean|boolean]] and [[true]], the effect is launched.
*If the result is an [[object]], the effect is launched if the result is the player or the player vehicle.
*If the result is an [[Array|array]], the effect is launched if the result contains the player or the player vehicle. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''setEffectCondition''' statement </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> statement: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> waypoint '''setEffectCondition''' statement </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Waypoint]] - [[Array]] format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> statement: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_triggerObj [[setEffectCondition]] "thisList";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[createTrigger]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
